fields.name: Unstoppable (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to ~~occupy~~ roleblock and redirect.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Royal Blood (Passive):
fields.value:
During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Imprison (Day):
fields.value:
Choose target player to imprison tonight, occupying those targeting your prisoner. At night, you may interrogate them via chat. Usable day 1.
- Can only jail the same player 3x.
- Cannot target King.

fields.name: Execute (Night, 3 Uses):
fields.value:
Execute the jailed player. If they are ~~Blue Dragon~~ Town, lose all charges of Execute. Not usable until Night 3.
- Death is inevitable

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Because we didn't have enough Jailors. Is Town Power and is not Conversion immune.
Occupy is not the same as Roleblock for Prince specifically so it can still prevent visits.
